author: Sandile
text:
I check your portfolio 🔥, I see the animation and wonderful UI/UX ☺️ and gets intimidated🤕, I read that you went through college/bootcamp📚, gets confidence because I can do the same effortlessly 😙🍃

It's rollercoaster of emotions for me but know what I can do 😁❤️

author: Sandile
text:
I'm not a "5 tips on how to be a web developer" but I am a person who you can actually talk to about web development and I'll guide you where I can. 

I'm here to talk to you and gain a actual friend. 🙂

author: Sandile
text: So a person approached me on Discord and asked me how to step into backend development. I told him how and after he wanted to know my story, of how I got into tech. I think I'm getting so used to telling my story that I'm tired of hearing it...

author: Sandile
text: Don't think about it too much, a person with a big audience will retweet your post and you'll be the next big thing. Keep going!!!
